channel.title: creatures on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in creatures on Chaotic Online

item.title: Blazier
item.description: Blazier is an OverWorld Scout and the cartographer of his Tribe.

item.title: Blazier, Citadel Cartographer
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 40 1         70 40 60 40 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 5'9"Weight 135 lbsEyes Light Green Hair Mid-Gray Skin Sunflower Gold Loyalty OverWorlders   Blazier strives to be the first to discover new lands.

item.title: Bodal
item.description: Bodal is an OverWorld Caretaker and the head Logistics Manager of his Tribe

item.title: Bodal, Flamedrill Researcher
item.description: Archives Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 30 1         50 20 80 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 5'2"Weight 125 lbsEyes Dark Rose Skin Mountain Meadow Green   In the Animation, during the events of Raznus Returns, right before Raznus and Odu-Bathax accidentally burst into the OverWorld Arsenal with a small army of Mandiblors on their survivability mission to find a new homeland for the Danians — since the M’arrillians had poisoned the waters of the Mount Pillar Reservoir — Bodal and his assistant Olkiex were working in an enormous Battlegear capable of breaking the molecular bonds of any solid compound.

item.title: Chaor
item.description: Chaor is an UnderWorld Conqueror and the Warrior ruler of the UnderWorld Tribe

item.title: Chaor, The Fierce
item.description: "E-mann's" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 0         80 105 45 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'Weight 1175 lbsEyes Pine Green Skin Dark Steel-grey Bright red, Orange & Sunflower Yellow (flames) Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians Lord van Bloot   Exiled from the UnderWorld, Chaor has lost his homeland and his throne.

item.title: Dractyl
item.description: Dractyl is a terrifying flying Overworld Scout and a swift spy of his Tribe

item.title: H'earring
item.description: H’earring is an UnderWorld Scout and great small a spy for his Tribe.

item.title: H'earring, Tainted
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 50 1         45 65 40 50 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 3'8"Weight 90 lbsEyes Royal Blue Hair Turkey Red Skin Lime Green Loyalty M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, in order to maximize the effects of their plan of flooding all of Perim, the M’arrillians had to reshape part of the land by building dams in strategic Locations.

item.title: Heptadd
item.description: Heptadd is a powerful Guardian and a Muge of the OverWorld

item.title: Magmon
item.description: Magmon is an UnderWorld Elementalist descendant of the ruler of his Tribe back in the times of Ancient Perim

item.title: Magmon, Retaliator
item.description: Khary Randolph Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 70 0         55 85 15 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'5"Weight 1525 lbsEyes Dark reddish-orange Skin Dark brownish-grey Loyalty M'arrillians Temporary Allegiance Enemies M'arrillians   During the M’arrillian Invasion, Khybon, brainwashed by Phelphor, under the command of the M’arrillian Chieftain Milla’iin, started building the enormous pipes needed to flood the Lava Pond with the waters of Everrain.

item.title: Malvadine
item.description: Malvadine is an Elite Warrior of the Mipedian Tribe.

item.title: Malvadine, The King's Herald
item.description: Khary Randolph Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 1         85 50 45 100 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'7"Weight 388 lbsEyes Yellowish-green & Black Skin Reddish-orange Loyalty Mipedians Preferred Locations Kaizeph, the City of Elements   We shall claim this city for Mipedim as we await King Theb-saar's return!

item.title: Maxxor
item.description: Maxxor is an OverWorld Hero and the ruler of the OverWorld Tribe

item.title: Maxxor, Protector of Perim
item.description: "stonewurks'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 55 0         110 55 80 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 9'4"Weight 322 lbsEyes Hazel Hair Black & White Skin Green Violet (markings) Preferred Battlegear Xerium Armor Enemies M'arrillians   I don't just fight for the OverWorld!

item.title: Najarin
item.description: Najarin is an OverWorld Muge who serves Maxxor along with Intress as one of his Counsellors.

item.title: Najarin, Fluidmorphers' Foe
item.description: "warlockss'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 25 3         30 35 70 45 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Azure Blue Hair Light Platinum-Gray Skin Light Teal-Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Najarin's Castle Kiru City Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, really powerful Creatures entered the fray, some with much stronger innate abilities than most of the Creatures of any other Tribe.

item.title: Najarin, High Muge of the Lake
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 35 2         60 30 100 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Azure Blue Hair Light Platinum-Gray Skin Light Teal-Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Najarin's Castle Kaizeph, the City of Elements   After all the marvels I've seen him perform, I still don't know the limits of Najarin's power.

item.title: Najarin, Younger
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 25 2         60 30 90 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'6"Weight 225 lbsEyes Persian Green Hair Dark Yellowish-brown Skin Light Azure Blue Loyalty OverWorlders Preferred Locations Kiru Village   Little did he know then that his name would become synonymous with history itself

item.title: Nauthilax
item.description: Nauthilax is an UnderWorld Elementalist and a maritime spy to his Tribe

item.title: Nauthilax, Aquatic Spy
item.description: Archive Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 60 2         65 50 60 55 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'11"Weight 273 lbsEyes Electric Blue & Fire-brick Red Skin Green Apple Loyalty UnderWorlders   Hiding impatiently, just out of sight, Nauthilax soon learned that it's hard to let others do the hard work for you

item.title: Nauthilax, Tainted
item.description: Dan Norton Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 60 0         80 100 40 65 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'11"Weight 273 lbsEyes Electric Blue & Fire-brick Red Skin Green Apple Loyalty M'arrillians   In the Animation, when the events of the M’arrillian Invasion effectively began, Phelphor mind-controls the Guardians of the Deepmines Vinta, Junda, Tartarek and Nauthilax himself so they could open the Doors of the Deepmines for him.

item.title: Prince Mudeenu
item.description: Prince Mudeenu is a Mipedian Royal and the next in line of succession of his Tribe

item.title: Prince Mudeenu, Champion of the Guard
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 55 0         85 40 20 80 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'6"Weight 325 lbsEyes Greenish-brown Mulberry-pink Skin Light Mustard Brandy-brown Loyalty Mipedians   You can either surrender or die.

item.title: Takinom
item.description: Takinom is an UnderWorld Commander who serves Chaor as one of his Counsellors, along with Agitos.

item.title: Takinom, the Shadowknight
item.description: "warlockss'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 1         50 90 40 70 Elements         Biography Gender FemaleHeight 8'10"Weight 268 lbsEyes Reddish-orange Hair Dark Copper-auburn Skin Light Golden-yellow Dark Green (markings) Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, Takinom becomes even more committed to her Tribe and, enraged with the M’arrillians’ ideals, comes into play the unique Shadowknight, a much more powerful, resilient and swifter Creature, regardless the heavy weight of the new full-body armour, with a different set skills and abilities.

item.title: Tangath Toborn
item.description: Tangath Toborn is a brave Warrior and wise a Strategist of the OverWorld

item.title: Tangath Toborn, In Training
item.description: "warlockss'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 65 2         65 70 80 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'3"Weight 294 lbsEyes Pear Yellow Hair Dark Brownish-copper &Light Carmine (mane) Skin Light Copper-orange (fur) Loyalty OverWorlders Mipedians Danians Preferred Locations Kiru City Glacier Plains Preferred Battlegear Sword of Khy'at Enemies M'arrillians   Given his battle prowess and military expertise, as seen during the events of Putting the Muge in Mugic, Tangath was chosen to lead a group of OverWorld fighters to resolve a territorial strife with Prince Mudeenu and his squad of Mipedians in the neutral border between the OverWorld and the Mipedian territory.

item.title: Tangath Toborn, OverWorld General
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 60 0         55 75 95 35 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'3"Weight 294 lbsEyes Pear Yellow Hair Red Damask, Dark Brown & Light Orangeish-yellow (mane) Skin Light Copper-orange (fur) Loyalty OverWorlders UnderWorlders Mipedians Danians Preferred Locations Kiru City Glacier Plains Preferred Battlegear Sword of Khy'at Enemies M'arrillians   During the apex of the M’arrillian Invasion, while the Ground Team formed by Aimukk, Tassanil, Malvadine, Viqtarr, Faash, Arias, Targubaj, Lyssta and Ultadur were tunnelling the Mipedian Conjurors Fivarth, Savell and Drimesse as an attempt to ambush Phelphor and his Kha’rall Fighters, Tangath Toborn led a small elite squad formed by Bierk, Shimmark, Ghatup, Frafdo and Nebres towards the Glacier Plains to put an end to the M’arrillians’ plans by destroying once and for all their heat cannon.

item.title: Tartarek
item.description: Tartarek is an OverWorld Hero and the head of the spy network head of his Tribe

item.title: Tartarek, Psi-Overloader
item.description: "warlockss'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 2         90 40 110 55 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 5'6"Weight 271 lbsEyes Midnight Green Hair Pavlova Beige Skin Coco-Milk (body) Tussock Yellow (shell) Loyalty M'arrillians Preferred Locations Kiru City Preferred Battlegear Reefshard   In the Animation, when the events of the M’arrillian Invasion effectively began, Phelphor mind-controls the Guardians of the Deepmines, Vinta, Junda, Nauthilax and Tartarek, so they could open the Doors of the Deepmines.

item.title: Ulmar
item.description: Ulmar is an UnderWorld Conqueror and the mad scientist of his Tribe

item.title: Ulmar, Perithon Racer
item.description: "warlockss'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 45 1         40 30 70 30 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 4'4"Weight 133.5 lbsEyes Dark Purple Skin Forest Green Loyalty UnderWorlders Preferred Battlegear Ulmanator Enemies M'arrillians   To improve the Ulmanator's top speed, Ulmar removed all unnecessary components from the vehicle.

item.title: Ulmar, Wavescrambler
item.description: Archive Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 30 0         35 55 65 65 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 4'4"Weight 133.5 lbsEyes Dark Purple Skin Forest Green Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the final battle against the M’arrillians, during the events of Legions of Aa’une, right when Phelphor thought the battle was won, Ibiaan, Kelvedran, Akkrean, Screamer, Mallash and several other Creatures of the Tribal Alliance, along with their own footsoldiers, all of them led by an enraged Takinom, Shadowknight show up to even up the score.

item.title: Wamma
item.description: Wamma is a Danian Mandiblor and the most iconic Creature of his Tribe

item.title: Wamma, Flame Guard
item.description: Google Images Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 50 1         70 65 40 25 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'4.5"Weight 702 lbsEyes Cornflower Blue Skin Dark-orange Persimmon Loyalty Danians   With the ascension of Aszil, the Young Queen to the Danian throne after the abdication of his mother, Queen Illexia, while on an expedition for territorial expansion northwards, the Danians unintentionally excavated the Tremor Gate in the vicinities of Silchaw’s Mine.

item.title: Wamma, Hive Ordnance
item.description: "warlockss'" DeviantArt Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 50 0         55 45 65 35 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'4.5"Weight 702 lbsEyes Cornflower Blue Skin Dark-orange Persimmon Loyalty Danians Preferred Locations Mount Pillar   In the Animation, starting with the M’arrillian Invasion, Wamma has been reassigned to the ordnance branch of the Danian armed forces.

item.title: Zhade
item.description: Zhade is a Mipedian Stalker and an infiltrator agent of his Tribe

item.title: Zhade, Dig Site Defender
item.description: Archive Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 45 1         65 45 30 95 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'Weight 215 lbsEyes Medium-Blue Skin Golden Brown (skin) Fire-brick Red (frill) Goldenrod Flower Yellow (horns) Loyalty Mipedians   Zhade makes sure that those spies unfortunate enough to learn what was unearthed never report their findings
